node.title: Trevor Noah Says Omicron Might Not Be So Bad
node.alt: Noah joked Omicron is “like those microscopic bugs that live in your eyelashes: Even if you don’t see them, you know that they’re there.”
node.description: Noah said that new strains are like streaming new TV shows: “You gotta stick with it the first couple of weeks and see where it goes.”
node.content: ["Welcome to Best of Late Night, a rundown of the previous night\u2019s highlights that lets you sleep \u2014 and lets us get paid to watch comedy. Here are the 50 best movies on Netflix right now.", "The first Covid cases with the new Omicron strain have been reported in the United States.", "Trevor Noah encouraged viewers not to freak out just yet, saying, \u201cWe have no idea if Omicron is actually that bad.\u201d", "Tracy Morgan talks about why he\u2019s going back onstage on Thursday\u2019s \u201cDesus & Mero.\u201d", "Bette Midler shared her love of classics like \u201cI Know Why the Caged Bird Sings\u201d and Charles Dickens, among others, in this week\u2019s By the Book."]
